message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be a great asset to you. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate you coming back with an offer.  While I'm motivated to sell, $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you do $14,000?
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $12,500 for the product.
